direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve managing elements within the form, but 'elements()' retrieves them while 'addElement' adds them.
Both methods modify the list of elements, but 'removeChild' removes an element instead of adding one.
Both methods interact with form elements, but 'formData()' collects data from them while 'addElement' adds new elements.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
